title: Trying to locate font in header and text.
content:
Hi all,

I’m trying to locate the font used in this header (see attached).

I’m also after the font text used (see attached).

Can anyone please help?

Thanks in advance all!

Warmest regards,  
Tony

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo1.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828223629/http:/typophile.com/files/logo1_1.gif) | 3.61 KB |
| [text1.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828223629/http:/typophile.com/files/text1.gif) | 9.82 KB |

 [‹ MAQ new concepts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828223629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36648 "Go to previous forum topic") [Coalition Logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828223629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32393 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tone

comments.content: Looks like Univers to me.. Roman and maybe ultra-condensed?

The “London NYC” logo looks like [Empire](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828223629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/empire/), [Silhouette](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828223629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/silhouette/), [Iris](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828223629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/iris/) or similar with some kind of “beveal and emboss” effect applied...

BTW: Next time you should post your font ID questions in the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828223629/http:/www.typophile.com/forum/29) forum...
